name: The Classics
description: A collection of my favorite recipes, mostly from my childhood, reminders of a simpler time. They're all relatively cheep, simple and yet still scrumptious.

recipes.description: My favorite chicken wings recipe. Chicken wings are probably my favorite food, and these are my favorite wings! They're also easy as to make and cheap as, just wonderful.
A classic from my childhood. Again another simple but wonderfully tasty recipe. Can never get enough.
The go to curry in winter for my family. Creamy, rich and super simple. Great as a freezer meal as well if you're into batch cooking like that.
The alternative spice mix for the first recipe in this list, the spicy chicken wings. Mix and match spices to make this however you like!
My favorite and go to lunch box treat as a kid. Amazingly moist and tasty and endlessly moreish! Always reminds me of simpler times in primary school.
Something my mum has made for a long long time now always as a treat! Amazingly versatile with its fillings and incredibly tasty.
The cheap and easy weeknight dinner from my childhood. Incredibly simple and easy to elevate.
As kids we got to pick our birthday dinners and this was my pick for a long time! Just brilliantly bold thai flavours and grilled chicken, can't go wrong.
The dessert we have every Christmas and have done for many years. It is just such a fluffy delight that I wouldn't ever say no to.
